resources.string: Choose an option with the Menu key

This is currently a diagnostic tool under development. More features will be added.

 'Dump image data' dumps details about the images currently on the device. These are taken from the MediaProvider. However, the 'Actual file size' and \ the 'Actual mTime' are read from the image file itself. \(These details are also being logged\) 

 \ 'Hash my Images' and 'Hash my videos' produce SHA1 or MD5 hashes of your files and dump info about time taken\ , file names, sizes, etc. to the screen and logs 

 \ 'Flip Hash algorithm' toggles between SHA1 and MD5 

 \ It also does what the title says; \ hold your phone with the app running, close to a dog.
No images found, or MediaProvider not populated yet. \n Give it some time or take some pictures.
